FLAVOUR_0_BODY.description: This is a very rare string, that's part of an 'Easter egg'. This specific one is a reference to the song by AC/DC. It is formated as a list
FLAVOUR_0_BODY.message:
只要打362436，我就一直在家。我经营：
-混凝土鞋，
-氰化物，
-TNT，
-领带，
-合同，
-高压，

…或者只是打个电话。

FLAVOUR_0_DESC.description: Second line for an easter-egg AC/DC song title reference.
FLAVOUR_0_DESC.message: 如果你有麻烦，随时打电话给我。

FLAVOUR_0_TITLE.description: The 'all caps' title should probably not be translated, as it's an AC/DC song title reference. Either way, it's a very rare 'Easter egg'
FLAVOUR_0_TITLE.message: 卑鄙的行为做得非常廉价

FLAVOUR_1_BODY.description: This is a very rare string, that's part of an 'Easter egg'. This specific one is a reference to https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/867-5309/Jenny
FLAVOUR_1_BODY.message: 你不认识我，给我打电话；867-5309/珍妮

FLAVOUR_1_DESC.description: A very rare Easter egg, and reference to a line from a famous song.
FLAVOUR_1_DESC.message: 每个人都需要一个倾听的耳朵。

FLAVOUR_1_TITLE.description: A very rare Easter egg, and reference to a line from a famous song.

FLAVOUR_2_BODY.description: A very rare easter egg, referencing a online myth from 90s: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Titor
FLAVOUR_2_BODY.message:
I'm John Titor of the Time Travel Institute, from the year 4036. I'm heading to 1975 to pick up an IBM 5100 computer to degbug legacy computer programs that haven't been ported properly to the machines of my time, but I'm stopping by here to collect information about your time before it's lost in the great calamity.

I intend to return with a six part description on what's needed for time machines to operate. In short, my time machine is a stationary mass, temporal displacement unit, powered by two top-spin dual-positive singularities that produce a standard off-set tipler sinusoid. The displacement unit moves through time, not space.

I will be happy to post pictures of the unit upon request.

FLAVOUR_2_DESC.message: 'If time travel is real, where are all the time travelers?'

FLAVOUR_2_TITLE.description: A very rare Easter egg, referencing Internet myth of John Titor.
FLAVOUR_2_TITLE.message: People of the past, be wary of the GREAT CALAMITY!
